\/D:\/repos\/stride-translations\/pt-BR\: Open your project in Visual Studio
Abra seu projeto no Visual Studio
Open your project in Visual Studio
Game Studio will later support adding NuGet packages directly.
Game Studio irá mais tarde apoiar adicionar pacotes NuGet diretamente.
Game Studio will later support adding NuGet packages directly.
First of all, after saving all your changes, open your project with Visual Studio.
Primeiro de tudo, depois de salvar todas as suas mudanças, abra seu projeto com Visual Studio.
First of all, after saving all your changes, open your project with Visual Studio.
You can easily do this by clicking the appropriate button on the toolbar:
Você pode facilmente fazer isso clicando no botão apropriado na barra de ferramentas:
You can easily do this by clicking the appropriate button on the toolbar:
In the <g1>Solution Explorer</g1>, right-click on the project and click on <g2>Manage NuGet Packages...</g2>
No <g1>Solution Explorer</g1>, clique com o botão direito do mouse no projeto e clique em <g2>Manage NuGet Packages...</g2>
In the <g1>Solution Explorer</g1>, right-click on the project and click on <g2>Manage NuGet Packages...</g2>
For our example, let's use <g1>Stride.AssetPack.BuildingBlocks</g1> package:
Por nosso exemplo, vamos usar <g1>Stride.AssetPack.BuildingBlocks</g1> pacote:
For our example, let's use <g1>Stride.AssetPack.BuildingBlocks</g1> package:
Make sure <g1>Include prerelease</g1> is checked (if necessary)
Certifique-se de <g1>Incluir pré-lançamento</g1> é verificado (se necessário)
Make sure <g1>Include prerelease</g1> is checked (if necessary)
<g1>Search</g1> for a Stride asset package (i.e. <g2>Stride.AssetPack.BuildingBlocks</g2>) and select <g3>Install</g3>
<g1> Pesquisa </g1> para um pacote de ativos Stride (i.e. <g2>Stride.AssetPack.BuildingBlocks</g2>) e selecione <g3>Install</g3>
<g1>Search</g1> for a Stride asset package (i.e. <g2>Stride.AssetPack.BuildingBlocks</g2>) and select <g3>Install</g3>
In <g1>Game Studio</g1>, go to the <g2>File</g2> menu and select <g3>Reload project</g3>
Em <g1>Game Studio</g1>, vá para o menu <g2>File</g2> e selecione <g3>Reload project</g3>
In <g1>Game Studio</g1>, go to the <g2>File</g2> menu and select <g3>Reload project</g3>
You should now be able to see the referenced project and its assets in <g1>Solution explorer</g1>
Agora você deve ser capaz de ver o projeto referenciado e seus ativos em <g1>Solution explorer</g1>
You should now be able to see the referenced project and its assets in <g1>Solution explorer</g1>
Those assets are readonly and as such can't be dragged and dropped into the scene.
Esses ativos são somente leitura e, como tal, não podem ser arrastados e deixados cair na cena.
Those assets are readonly and as such can't be dragged and dropped into the scene.
In the meantime, you can still use the asset selector to change an existing model or material reference to one from the asset pack.
Entretanto, você ainda pode usar o seletor de ativos para alterar um modelo ou referência de material existente para um do pacote de ativos.
In the meantime, you can still use the asset selector to change an existing model or material reference to one from the asset pack.
